title: WTT: My T205 Sovereign 3-Finger Brown for your Sovereign T205/T206
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Sovereign 3-Finger Brown for your Sovereign T205/T206
posts.post_content:
Anybody need a Cubbie HOFer?  I need a few Sovereign T205s, a bunch of Sovereign T206, and probably some upgrades.  Let me know what you have if you'd like to trade.  My scanner doesn't do well with slabs, so let me know if you want a phone pic that will be a bit clearer.  Thanks!

Take Care,
Geno
